mapper.sql: select m.p_id, m.patient_code, m.hospital_code, m.equipment_code, connection_time, bed_number, case_history_number, ecg_type, online_status, patient_name, patient_age, patient_sex, patient_source, m.patient_phone, family_phone, monitoring_status, equipment_status, equipment_type, hospital_name, intelligent_diagnosis, diagnosis_status, diagnosis_conclusion, diagnosis_doctor, report_time, ecg_level, doctor_phone from patient_management m inner join patient p on p.patient_phone = m.patient_phone inner join equipment e on m.equipment_code = e.equipment_code left join hospital h on m.hospital_code = h.hospital_code left join report r on m.p_id = r.p_id
mapper.insert:
insert into patient_management
patient_code, hospital_code, equipment_code, connection_time, bed_number, case_history_number, ecg_type, online_status, patient_phone, ecg_level, doctor_phone,
#{patientCode}, #{hospitalCode}, #{equipmentCode}, #{connectionTime}, #{bedNumber}, #{caseHistoryNumber}, #{ecgType}, #{onlineStatus}, #{patientPhone}, #{ecgLevel}, #{doctorPhone},
mapper.update:
update patient_management set online_status = 1 where patient_management.p_id in
#{pId}
mapper.delete:
delete from patient_management where p_id in
#{pId}
